property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] enters [[Hotland]] from the Steamworks through this elevator.

property.name: description
property.value: This elevator, leading to New Home, is usually in use. It only opens after joining up with [[Martlet]] in the [[Pacifist Route]] or killing her in the [[Genocide Route]].

property.name: page
property.value: New Home

property.name: description
property.value: A trumpeting plant, one of the ones from the [[Chemistry Lab]], appears here.

properties.property: [[Clover]] meets with Martlet on the rooftop on all three routes. * On the [[Neutral Route]], she convinces Clover to live in [[Snowdin]] with her. Unsatisfied with this ending, [[Flowey]] instead kills her and absorbs Clover's SOUL. * On the [[Pacifist Route]], she tells Clover how much she cares about them and her plan for getting them to the Surface. She follows them to [[New Home]] to confront [[Ceroba]]. * On the [[Genocide Route]], she injects herself with [[determination]] to stop them. After she is defeated, the rooftop is in ruins.

property.name: description
property.value: UG Apartments is an apartment complex. While [[Clover]] cannot rent a room, they can [[SAVE]], purchase items, and talk to [[UG Apartments/NPCs|NPCs]] before heading off to the final boss.

property.name: page
property.value: UG Apartments

property.name: description
property.value: The slime janitor from ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]'' admires their hard work here.

property.name: description
property.value: This monster chats about the future of the Underground.

property.name: page
property.value: Lobby Lad

property.name: description
property.value: This monster expresses frustration about their name being misunderstood and the elevator being occupied.

property.name: page
property.value: Mr. Cursor

property.name: description
property.value: The handlord from ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]'' talks about the apartment complex or the [[ut:CORE|CORE]] being under maintenance, depending on what [[Clover]] asks. After they walk away, the Handlord calls after them to tell them [[Martlet]] wanted to meet them on the rooftop.

property.name: description
property.value: The fish receptionist from ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]'' cannot offer [[Clover]] a reservation, as the dining room is full of ghosts.

property.name: description
property.value: Rodney's band only plays one song this time, ''[[UG Apartments]]''. Rodney wishes [[Clover]] luck on the end of their journey.

property.name: page
property.value: Rodney's Band

property.name: description
property.value: This monster is extremely early to a date.

property.name: page
property.value: Cold Man

property.name: description
property.value: This tiny monster talks about how much they love [[UG Apartments]].

property.name: page
property.value: Food Enjoyer

property.name: description
property.value: This spider monster talks about a story their grandmother told them about rain. They also talk about [[Waterfall]] being hard to get to from [[Hotland]] at the moment, hinting at "the path."

property.name: page
property.value: Spider Girl

property.name: description
property.value: The washed-up monster from the [[Wild East]] saloon just bought an apartment! They plan to use it to produce music.

property.name: description
property.value: The monster from the [[Dunes]] sandstorm now waits in line here impatiently.

property.name: page
property.value: Fan Fan

property.name: description
property.value: The diamond monster from ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]'' waits in line, wishing someone would bring them easy entertainment.

property.name: page
property.value: Diamond Boy

property.name: description
property.value: Heats Flamesman from ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]'' insists his name must be on the guest list.

property.name: page
property.value: Heats Flamesman

property.name: description
property.value: This monster is Club Danza's bouncer. They are surprised to find [[Clover]] on the VIP guest list if [[El Bailador]] was spared and tells them the club is closed if he was killed.

property.name: description
property.value: El Bailador returns! Having been the one to add [[Clover]] to the guest list, he invites them to dance. He also shares his backstory with [[Decibat]].

property.name: page
property.value: El Bailador

property.name: description
property.value: Four Frostermits are found here, in four different appearances. One is a [[Snowdin]] Frostermit, one is [[Dunes]], one is [[Steamworks]], and one is [[Hotland]].

property.name: description
property.value: These spiders are in the midst of construction and do not let [[Clover]] pass. They are working on [[ut:Muffet|Muffet]]'s boss room from ''[[Undertale]]''.

property.name: page
property.value: Spider Workers

properties.property: The UGPS station in [[Hotland]]. The letters obtainable here are: * [[Mail#MAIL???|Axis's letter]] if he was spared, not including on a [[Genocide Route]] aborted in the [[Steamworks]], * [[Mail#Ceroba (Important)|Ceroba's letter]], only on a [[Neutral Route]] where [[Starlo]] was spared, * [[Mail#Slurpy Letter 2|Slurpy's second letter]] if their sidequest was completed, * Of couse, any letters from past signs not picked up, including [[Mail#Starlo (Urgent)|Starlo's urgent letter]] on a [[Pacifist Route]].

property.name: page
property.value: Underground Postal Service

properties.property: "Garbage day: Monday If you can't reach the Dump, throw all trash bags off the cliff south of here. The lava below should do the job."
"(There's a note on the door.) Stranger, please stop eating the cat food I leave out. It's for a stray who's stuck in here with us, not for monsters."
"(There's an inscription on the fountain.) Hopes and Dreams Built 201X (You hear a faint melody coming from the statue.)"

"(You notice a ranking sheet on the board.) Winners of the "Actually Magma Smoothie Challenge": - Pyrope (Fastest time.) - Grillby (Calm and collected.) - Cinderhead (Struggled but finished strong.) - Heats... something (We forgot who this was.) - Starlo (Was only trying to impress someone.) - Fuku Fire (Most enthusiasm) - Know Cone (Transported to a hospital. We might be in legal trouble.)"
"(You notice a schedule of upcoming acts on the board.) (The name "Mettaton" appears many, many times.)"
"Caution: Slippery when wet! Caution: Slippery when dry! This section of tiling lacks friction and we do not know how to fix it!"
"CORE currently under maintenance. Please do not climb over the velvet rope."

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "Apt. Complex".

properties.property: This shop is run by two monsters, Bits and Buttons. They sell: * [[Monster Candy+]] (26G) * [[C-B Strudel]] (24G) * [[Floral Cupcake]] (50G) * [[Delta Rune Patch]] (100G) On the [[Genocide Route]], the shop background is dark, presumably since its lights are off.

property.name: page
property.value: Bits & Bites

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] can take a Hot Dog from this trash can.

property.name: page
property.value: Hot Dog

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] can take a butterscotch flavored Monster Candy from this trash can.

property.name: page
property.value: Monster Candy

property.name: description
property.value: On the [[Neutral Route]], [[Clover]] battles [[Flowey]] here until he resets. On the [[Genocide Route]], Clover battles [[Zenith Martlet]] here, then moves on to [[New Home]] when she is defeated.

property.name: description
property.value: The final point of no return on all three routes. On the [[Genocide Route]], [[Clover]] can still reload back before this point if they die here. On the [[Neutral Route]], make sure you have seen everything you wanted to before continuing. On the [[Pacifist Route]], see everything you wanted to, '''stock up on healing items''', and '''get better armor''' before continuing.
